title: Super Galaxy Shyvana Death Animation
body: I love this skin alot but, the death animation is glitched. When she dies their is like a line connecting her gloves and hands??? It looks really awkward and definitely is a bug that was never noticed.I would love for it to be fixed. <3

replies.body: Yikes! Looks like it's a rigging issue. Our tech artist is lightning fast and just submitted a fix. If all goes well, you'll see this fixed up for next patch! Thanks for taking the time to report this! <3
Of course! Looks to be fixed on PBE, which means it's good to roll out with the next patch. :D
